thread.title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Commences Consent Solicitation By Wynn Las Vega, Wynn Las Vegas Capital

title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Commences Consent Solicitation By Wynn Las Vega, Wynn Las Vegas Capital
text: February 16, 2018 / 7:36 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Commences Consent Solicitation By Wynn Las Vega, Wynn Las Vegas Capital Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Wynn Resorts Ltd: * WYNN RESORTS ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF CONSENT SOLICITATION BY WYNN LAS VEGAS, LLC AND WYNN LAS VEGAS CAPITAL CORP. * WYNN RESORTS LTD - ‍CONSENT SOLICITATION WILL EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M., NEW YORK CITY TIME, ON FEBRUARY 27, 2018​ * WYNN RESORTS SAYS PROPOSED AMENDMENT WOULD CONFORM DEFINITION OF “CHANGE OF CONTROL” RELATING TO OWNERSHIP OF EQUITY INTERESTS IN CO * WYNN RESORTS - UNITS ‍COMMENCED SOLICITATION CONSENTS TO PROPOSED AMENDMENT TO INDENTURE GOVERNING 4.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
